Class ec.e.rep.steward.CrewRepositorySetter 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.e.rep.steward.CrewRepositorySetter
public class CrewRepositorySetter
extends Object
This STEWARD class forwards the in-vat StandardRepository after it has been opened to the CrewRepository. If you just want to use the StandardRepository, use the createCrewRepository() version. For convenience, StandardRepositorymaker also calls setRepository below after opening a StandardRepository.

CrewRepositorySetter()

setRepository(SimpleRepository, Vat)

 public CrewRepositorySetter()

setRepository

                                  Vat vat) throws IOException
